comment_body: I absolutely loved the food at this kitchen! The burgers were juicy and the toppings were fresh. I will definitely be coming back.
The hot dogs were really good and the toppings were creative. The only thing I would change is the bun - it was a bit too hard for my taste.
I was really impressed with the quality of the pad thai. The flavors were spot on and the chicken was cooked perfectly. I will definitely be ordering from this kitchen again.
